text.en: Through the blessings of the infallible Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: lumé könchok sum gyi jinlab kyi

text.en: May my own parents be freed from the sufferings
text.en-trans: dak gi pama khorwa ngensong gi

text.en: Of saṃsāra’s lower realms and reborn in Sukhāvatī,
text.en-trans: dukngal lé drol dewachen kyé né

text.en: Where they may delight the protector Amitābha.
text.en-trans: öpakmé gön nyepar jé gyur chik

text.en: Through the force of all the virtuous deeds I have done
text.en-trans: dak gi tokma mé né danté bar

text.en: Throughout beginningless time until now,
text.en-trans: namkar lé kyi drebu gang gyipa

text.en: May all sentient beings, my kind parents,
text.en-trans: dé yi tu lé pama semchen ni

text.en: Be liberated from the cycle of saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: drinchen tadak khorwa lé drol shok

text.en: May my mother and father, who gave me life and physical form,
text.en-trans: dak gi lü sok kyepé pama dang

text.en: And the teachers and instructors who showed me the path to freedom
text.en-trans: dak la tarlam tönpé khen lob nam

text.en: Complete the two accumulations, purify their twofold obscurations,
text.en-trans: tsok nyi rabdzok drib nyi rab jang né

text.en: And delight the omniscient King of Dharma.
text.en-trans: künkhyen chö kyi gyalpo nyé gyur chik

text.en: May the patrons who have placed their trust in me,
text.en-trans: dak la ré tö gyipé jindak dang

text.en: As well as all those beings whom I have harmed,
text.en-trans: dak gi nö tsé jepé drowa dang

text.en: And those who have brought harm to me
text.en-trans: dak la nö tsé jepé semchen nam

text.en: Complete the accumulations, purify the obscurations, and swiftly attain enlightenment.
text.en-trans: tsok dzok drib jang sangye nyur tob shok

text.en: May all sentient beings, led by those whom I have abused,
text.en-trans: dak gi dek tsok sha trak zepa dang

text.en: Whose flesh and blood I have consumed,
text.en-trans: sok ché pu dang pakpa gyönpa sok

text.en: Whose lives I’ve cut short and whose fur and hides I’ve worn,
text.en-trans: drowa denam tsor jé semchen nam

text.en: Swiftly attain omniscience in reliance upon me.
text.en-trans: dak la ten né namkhyen nyur tob shok
